alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 2:51AM AKDT until March 15 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected including snow, freezing rain, and rain. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
